title: What is the future of artificial intelligence in next 10 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: The future Artificial Intelligence is more fascinating than ever. It is an advanced technology- Alexa, Siri, and Google assistant are the best example of AI. If we talking about the future, there are lots of scopes which will be coming like AI and robotics will merge People have predicted that by implementing this particular technology in the robotic world, multiple new inventions can be created. Simpler work environment Unlike any other predictions, this one says that AI will definitely improve your work environment. It will make your tasks simpler and humans will be able to focus on other key tasks. Universal Usage Artificial intelligence is already a part of various everyday activities. The future will make us dependent on this technology, for example, Self-driving car, now no need to take the lessons of driving anymore For more information, you can visit the website ( AppKnock dot co )

Though artificial intelligence always has been very predictable due to its use in robotics, the scenario has changed a lot. Therefore, the year 2020 would be considered to a roller coaster ride for all the AI enthusiasts around the world. Some of the most common trends that we will likely to witness in the year 2020 would include: 1. The introduction of IoT into AI followed by Blockchain to work on decision making as well as essentials like scalability, security, and more. 2. AI to work in the media and entertainment industry with huge likeliness to develop stories, work on scriptwriting, etc. 3. AI will be extensively used in cybersecurity systems to prevent data breaches. 4. AI will get more common into self-driving vehicles as well as the manufacturing industry. 5. AI will turn real-time with all the virtual interactions for customer targeting. 6. Privacy protection, facial recognition, and AI assistants will grow.

Am not that kind of guys that have data to support my answer…but accoerdin to me, programmes like AI, Big data analytics and some other specialization programs are very popular nowadays…but in 4–5 yeats this can become less important as there is a need to develop the software and hardware to match the ongoin development in the AI industry..so companies may give importance for the people who took software engineerimg fr their future. Therfore it depends on you…never go with the crowd..if you like somethin excel in that area..never chose what the crowd choses.

Enough Of The Future: AI Must Convert Health Care Today While health care delivery models differ significantly around the world, the challenges faced by providers are fairly universal across both the public and private sectors. Increasing care costs, increasing demand for services from an aging population and shortages of skills — which have become crippling in some markets — combine to create a perfect storm. https://planetstoryline.com/enough-of-the-future-ai-must-convert-health-care-today/
